long_description: Vittoria Zaffiro II tire is well-suited for training or putting in lots of miles, offering lasting wear, puncture protection and budget-friendliness. Slick center tread is flanked by crosshatched grooves for improved cornering grip. 26 tpi nylon casing and long-wearing compound ensure durable performance. Puncture-resistant belting is placed under the tread to ensure great flat protection. Recommended pressure for the Vittoria Zaffiro II tire is 100 - 145 psi (7 - 10 BAR).
short_description: Vittoria Zaffiro II tire is well-suited for training or putting in lots of miles, offering lasting wear, puncture protection and budget-friendliness.
